item.title: Ye Shall Not Fear
item.description:
Ye Shall Not Fear by Elder Alvin R. Dyer, Assistant to the Council of the Twelve given in Session 7 of 141st Annual General Conference on Wed Mar 31 1971
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Alvin R. Dyer, Assistant to the Council of the Twelve

item.title: The Nobility of Man in Choosing Good over Evil
item.description:
The Nobility of Man in Choosing Good over Evil by Elder Alvin R. Dyer, Assistant to the Council of the Twelve given in Session 7 of 141st Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1971
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.

item.title: The Last Dispensation
item.description:

This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
